title: Spicy and creamy seafood pasta
ingredients: ['450g fettuccine pasta', '500ml whipping cream', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '1 1/2 teaspoons crushed red chilli flakes', '1 teaspoon ground white pepper', '100g chopped spring onions', '50g chopped parsley', '225g prawns, peeled and deveined', '225g scallops', '60g grated Gruyere cheese', '40g grated Parmesan cheese']
